mapper.select: SELECT store_business_company_code AS storeBusinessCompanyCode ,store_business_company_name AS storeBusinessCompanyName ,store_business_company_ceo AS storeBusinessCompanyCeo ,store_business_company_phone AS storeBusinessCompanyPhone ,store_business_company_licensee AS storeBusinessCompanyLicensee ,store_business_company_email AS storeBusinessCompanyEmail ,store_business_company_date AS storeBusinessCompanyDate ,store_business_company_time AS storeBusinessCompanyTime FROM store_business_company
